reviewText: As a civil war re-enactor, I have known the 2nd South Carolina for some . the music is excellent.

Being a Civil War enthusiast, for a number of years and, collecting 2nd South Carolina String Band CD's, Far, Far from Home DVD, completes my collection, anyone interested in Civil War history or, folk music, will enjoy, Far, Far from Home.

I THOROUGHLY ENJOYED THIS VIDEO. THE SETTING IS A MID-WAR CONFEDERATE CAMP
AND IT LOOKS REAL. THE MUSIC SOUNDS EXACTLY RIGHT FOR THE TIME AND PLACE. ANOTHER FIRST CLASS JOB BY THE 2nd SOUTH CAROLINA STRING BAND.
this is a great dvd , the music and video make it like you were there. i liked it very much, well worth the money i thought.

This producto is a very good purchase, because I apreciate a civil war songs and civil war history. I've more tham 100 Cds and DVDs about this subject.
